body_html: For future readers: we are still seeing this with pytorch 0.3.1, and thus far our only working solution has been to move imports around as is mentioned above. I'd really like to see pytorch fix this if at all possible: we're introducing some relatively brittle hacks to work around it right now.

body: For future readers: we are still seeing this with pytorch 0.3.1, and thus far our only working solution has been to move imports around as is mentioned above. I'd _really_ like to see pytorch fix this if at all possible: we're introducing some relatively brittle hacks to work around it right now.
